title._content: Wallsend Slipway: Worker operating a turbine blading machine

description._content: Taken from the The Wallsend Slipway and Engineering Company Limited’s Collection Date: December 1916 Reference no. DS.WS/143/40 This photograph was selected by Les Mann as part of the 'Uncovering Archives Photography' Workshop held at Tyne and Wear Museums and Archives in November 2012. See Les' response to this image here: www.flickr.com/photos/mmi2009/8263370325/in/pool-uncoveri... Find out more about the project here: www.flickr.com/groups/uncoveringarchivesphotography/ (Copyright) We're happy for you to share this digital image within the spirit of The Commons. Please cite 'Tyne & Wear Archives & Museums' when reusing. Certain restrictions on high quality reproductions and commercial use of the original physical version apply though; if you're unsure please email archives@twmuseums.org.uk
